title: Christmastime 1941
description: This is an alternate-cover edition for B00FHCZWZO.Christmastime 1941, the second book in the Christmastime series, opens two days after Pearl Harbor has been attacked. War has just been declared. It follows the love story of Lillian and Charles, the adventures of Tommy and Gabriel, and the bittersweet romances of Lillianâ€™s friend Izzy, and the office manager at Drooms Accounting, sixty-year old Mrs. Murphy.
author: Agnes Irene
